Call to the Wind.name: Call to the Wind
Call to the Wind.flavor: A driving wind adds to the strength of your attack, pushing an enemy back and drawing the ire of that enemy and its companions.
Call to the Wind.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target 2 squares. The target and each enemy adjacent to it are then marked until the end of your next turn.

Form of the Northern Whirlwind.name: Form of the Northern Whirlwind
Form of the Northern Whirlwind.flavor: Your body takes on the form of the wind that howls around you, protecting you as it buffets your foes.
Form of the Northern Whirlwind.effect: You slide each target 1 square and then teleport to a square adjacent to one of them.
Form of the Northern Whirlwind.target: Each enemy marked by you in the burst
Form of the Northern Whirlwind.requirement: The power Form of the Northern Whirlwind must be active in order to use this power.

North Wind's Embrace.name: North Wind's Embrace
North Wind's Embrace.flavor: You call down a primal gale that protects you or an ally.
North Wind's Embrace.effect: You conjure a protective whirlwind in 1 square in the burst. The whirlwind lasts until the end of your next turn. While within the whirlwindâ€™s square, you or an ally gains resist 10 to all damage and a +2 power bonus to all defenses.
North Wind's Embrace.sustainMinor: The whirlwind persists, and you can move it your speed.
